forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: editing objects

comments.text: any creation in your area made by you can be edited by context-lasering it, and pressing "edit clone".
creations by others can be edited when they're set to "clonable".

thread.latestCommentText: creations by others can be edited when they're set to "clonable".
